S.FORM: Xincheng Xincheng a sakuwan ku Hualien. kumud nu kalesakan, 28.83 km². (kalesakan nu lin-pan-ti 0 km², kalesakan nu paw-liw-ti 0.22 km²), u kasabinawlan, 16,246 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 6,110 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 5,380 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, pakalatu 33% (Pangcah) ku kasabinawlan. u tademaw ilabu nu siyang u paylang ku alumanay. nikasakuwakuwan Xincheng mala walu a cuwen atu sabaw tusa ku niyazu'. kina sabaw tusa a niyazu'sa, Pacidal , Paudadan (大德 部落), Lalumaang , Palamitan , Kaliyawan , Cilapuk , Sudadatan , Pibutingan , Hupu , Katanka , Pabuisan , Palinkaan . Masikasik a kenis 新城鄉(太魯閣語:Alang paru,阿美語:Sudadatan；臺灣話:Sin-siânn-hiong；臺灣客家語海陸腔:sinˋ shang hiongˋ), ,面積為29.4095km², . Masikasik a kenis "Taluku a kamu Alang paru, Amis a kamu Sudadatan, Taywan a kamu Sin-siânn-hiong, Taywan Ngayngay a kamu sin' shang hiong'", malumanay a ngangan Tu-lu-man hakay Taluwan, tini i Taywan Kalingku akuwan tu nuwamisan, saamisan atu satipan micapi tu Siw-lin a kenis, sawalian walibayu, nutimulan u Cikep atu Kalingku a tuse a sakenis, u hekal 29.4095 km², micapi tu Kaling ku tuse hamin nu kenis u saadidi'ay nu kenis. uyni a kenis tungusay nu Kalingku a kika, hekal a lala' kakitizaan micangzay tu buyu' micapi tu bayu, singangan aca tu "Masikasik salining." sadipasan timulan u Malumayamay nuwamisan katukuh i Ye-ya-wan piazihan tu bayu, labu nu kenis yadah ku nipalumaan tu canancanan micidekay ku kakitizaan, malahad ku ni laculan tunu ba'tuay atu nisangaan a ba'tu, cunus tu kenisay mahizanay nu kasumamadan kuni kauzip nu tademaw, yadah ku palahad tu aidangan. ,HOLA,就設點於此鄉. Masikasik a kenis izaw ku salunganay a ngangan "mambo a niyazu'." uyni "mambo" uyaan imi nu ateban a Amilika iwaiw a lukiyaw, caay pitantan, kakuniza miiwaiwa, lipahak sakaku a mihulak.. uyzasa micapi tu Kalingku, atu Yusinu a kenis malecad tu Kalingku, angangan a tuse, hamin nu tuse a kakitizaan u tademaw katukuh i tusa a bataan a mang kakatuud, Kalingku a kuwan u saanaway tabakiay kasaupun a picakayan tu tuud Carrefour , HOLA, patizeng satu tini a kenis. liwliw a hekal Masikasik a kenis hamin a hekal u masaenalay ku liwliw, liwliw nu enal hamin nu kenis pakala tu 97%, nutimulan saamisan tanaya', nuwalian satipan likecu, nutimulan saamisan u tanaya' sabaw enem km, nuwalian satipan u saahebalay lima km, izaw ku Cikep a sauwac, Sancan a sauwac, atu Simeci a sauwac a kalikid. nilaculan caay kaw nikalukan atu nibutingan dada', malahad kuni pasazuma tu ba'tu a sakakawawan. Masikasik a kenis u sakuwanan pulung makakilac tu waluay a kasiniyazu', Masikasik a niyazu', Sumuladu a niyazu', Palamitan a niyazu', Tahan a niyazu', Hupu a niyazu', katanka a niyazu', Kaliyawan a ziyazu', Cyasin a niyazu'. 1/8. hamin a kenis pulung a kalasic u Masikasik atu Hupu tusa ku angangan a niyazu', uyni tusaay tabakiay a niyazu' u Masikasik a kenis malasit aca tu nuwamisan a Masikasik atu nutimulan u Masikasik, tusaay a kakitizaan lilis u Sancan a sauwac, masasulaed tu sabaw tusa kung-li. saamisan u Masikasik pasu Masikasik atu Sumuladu tusa a niyazu', malabelaw tu Taluku kanatal a aidangan atu Suhuwa a zazan, Siwlin kou-cung, Masikasik aididi'ay a cacudadan, Masikasik pikacawan tu basu, Masikasik a zinziya, Masikasik a aidangan atu Masikasik mukasiay a zazanan auuyni kenis a kakitizaan ngangan tu nipatizeng tini i nuwamisan Masikasik, nika uynian a kakitizaan izaw ku tusa malebut lima lasubu ku tademaw, hamin nu a kenis pakala tu 1/8. . nutimulan Masikasik pasu Hupu, Kaliyawan, Tahan, Palamitan, Cyasin atu Katanka enem kasaniyazu', hamin nu kenis katuuday a tademaw, miliyas tu sakuwan, sakuwan tu Kalingku tuse pakala tulu a kung-li ka batad, Hupu a pikacawan, Masikasik a kenis yakuba atu hukusiw, malukay pisupedan tu kalisiw, paiyubinan, hitay a padekuan, ngayangay, Kalingku a pahikukian, Katanka kakitizaan nu hikuki, Tahan talakaway a picudadan, Haysin kawcung, Masikasik a kucung,Taywan dingkiay a kusi, atu Carrefour u kahenulan a kakatayzaan patizeng i nutimula nu Masikasik. demiad . demiad tungus tatungusay a caledes, hamin nu kenis mihcaan palalecad tu akuti' se-s 22.5 Tu, palalecad tu nikaudadan 2,264 mm, sa'pi' ku demiad sepat puu' mahiza u sadingsing. laylay Masikasik a kenis i ayaway a duwman " hakay " Tawkeman." han. pikuwann nu hulam a ziday Cya-cin a mihcaan, Tan-suy a sakuwan tademaw ci U-cyen liliden ku papalukayay tayni tini patadas, Taluku a tademaw kinapina misamamaw militangah, misanga' tu sapitena', pangangan han "Masikasik," satu zayhan midebung ku yincumin sisa ales han ku tuse mabulaw tatimul. 1875 a mihcaan Bu-cyen hekalay a zazan sakakaay mikuwanay ci Ti-tu-luw-ta-cun mikelid tu hitay mipatades tu Su-huw katukuh i Kalingku a zazan, u saayaway micududay tuynian Kalingku, pangangan han tu "Masikasik". Masikasik i celacan 1896 a mihcaan zayhan i pingangayaw madebec maala tu nu Lipun. 1914 a mihcaan, pikuwanan nu Linpun a ziday u Taywan sakakaay nu mikuwanan ci Cuw-cyu-cyen cuw-ma nu uzip a putun mikelid tu hitay nu Linpun midademec tu Taluku, . masazay tu kina kawaw hawsa tini patizeng tu Kalingku a sakuwa Masikasi paca' a sakakaay, sakakaay a tapang a mabulah ci Cuw-cuw-cyenaan sakakaay a tapang tu nikawawan, kilul i 1920 a mihcaan nu zumaay a ngangan "Yen-hay" han, u Masikasik paca' a sakuwan pasumadan tu ngangan "Yen-hay paca' a sakuwan" han," pikuwan tu Pin-ya a kakitizaan. 1937 a mihcaan Kalingku a sakuwan a kakitizaan misumad tu lice, alesan ku Yen-hay paca' a sakuwan, Pin-ya a kakitizaan sumad tu ngangan "Yen-hay a niyazu'" han, tungus nu Kalingkuay a sakuwan Kalingku a kakuwanan. zikuzan nu ngangayaw duduc pazumaay tu ngangan, sakuwan nau Kalikuan a kenis binacadan a kakitizaan, patizeng tu Kalinngku a kuwan Yen-hay a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan mananukas tu malumanay a ngangan "Masikasik", pasumad han ku ngangan Masikasik a kenis, satu u yincumin a nu buyu' a kakitizaan kakilukilul satu tahekal, patizeng haca tu zumay Siw-lin a kenis katukuh ayza. tademaw Masikasik a kenis nu Kalingku akuwan sakasepat nu katud nu tademaw, uzeket u sakatulu a katalakaw tu pikawawan a kakitizaan, zuma a tademaw kazeket palalecad talakawanku hamin nu kanatal. ayzaay tu sabalima a mihcaan, Masikasik a kenis u tademaw mahiza tu i 2.0~2.1 a mgangn ku tademaw i labu, 2019 a mihcaan lima a buladan u tademaw atu 2011 a mihcaan malecad tu, caay kasumcd, nu Taywan tuse micidekay kuniklahad. . nika uynian tu a mihcaan kilul tu Kalingku akuwan cenbu i Hupu a niyazu' patizeng katukuh 651 luma'an tu pitu a tatunngduh nu masakapahay a luma', i sasaay a lumam' u sapisiwbay, pakay sebu akuwan palecad mikawaw mitakus tu misiwbayay a kawaw, uyniay a kakitizaan micapi tu Kalingku a tuse, labu nu kanatal izaw ku tabakiay a kakitizaan pacakay, talaayaw tiniay a kakitizaan adasay mala u Kalingku kalamkamay maladah a kakitizaan. caculilan sakayhikukiay silamalay a zazan tele zazan, baluhay "Taluku" pikacawan, Hupu pikacawan Kalingku micapi minatu a zazan, Hupu pikacawan pakatine tu zazan. sakaylalangawan niyazu' a kamu nu Taluku ku kamu atu A-mis a kamu. u tademaw na i Cung-yen mabulaway u ngayngay ku katuuday, caay kakatuud ku yincumin, Taywan malepun na mangangayaw hawsa, katuud ku Hulam mabulaw tayni tini, mahiza kasumamadan malumanay Layak a lisin, ienalay a yincumin paymihcaan tu waluay a bulad malingatu tu mamalikid.

Xincheng Xincheng a sakowan ko Hoalien. komod no kalesakan, 28.83 km². (kalesakan no lin-pan-ti 0 km², kalesakan no paw-liw-ti 0.22 km²), o kasabinawlan, 16,246 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 6,110 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 5,380 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, pakalato 33% (Pangcah) ko kasabinawlan. o tademaw ilabo no siyang o paylang ko alomanay. nikasakowakowan Xincheng mala walo a cowen ato sabaw tosa ko niyazo'. kina sabaw tosa a niyazo'sa, Pacidal , Paodadan (大德 部落), Lalomaang , Palamitan , Kaliyawan , Cilapok , Sodadatan , Pibotingan , Hopo , Katanka , Paboisan , Palinkaan . Masikasik a kenis 新城鄉(太魯閣語:Alang paro,阿美語:Sodadatan；臺灣話:Sin-siânn-hiong；臺灣客家語海陸腔:sinˋ shang hiongˋ), ,面積為29.4095km², . Masikasik a kenis "Taloko a kamo Alang paro, Amis a kamo Sodadatan, Taywan a kamo Sin-siânn-hiong, Taywan Ngayngay a kamo sin' shang hiong'", malomanay a ngangan To-lo-man hakay Talowan, tini i Taywan Kalingko akowan to nowamisan, saamisan ato satipan micapi to Siw-lin a kenis, sawalian walibayo, notimolan o Cikep ato Kalingko a tose a sakenis, o hekal 29.4095 km², micapi to Kaling ko tose hamin no kenis o saadidi'ay no kenis. oyni a kenis tongosay no Kalingko a kika, hekal a lala' kakitizaan micangzay to boyo' micapi to bayo, singangan aca to "Masikasik salining." sadipasan timolan o Malomayamay nowamisan katokoh i Ye-ya-wan piazihan to bayo, labo no kenis yadah ko nipalomaan to canancanan micidekay ko kakitizaan, malahad ko ni lacolan tono ba'toay ato nisangaan a ba'to, conos to kenisay mahizanay no kasomamadan koni kaozip no tademaw, yadah ko palahad to aidangan. ,HOLA,就設點於此鄉. Masikasik a kenis izaw ko salonganay a ngangan "mambo a niyazo'." oyni "mambo" oyaan imi no ateban a Amilika iwaiw a lokiyaw, caay pitantan, kakoniza miiwaiwa, lipahak sakako a miholak.. oyzasa micapi to Kalingko, ato Yosino a kenis malecad to Kalingko, angangan a tose, hamin no tose a kakitizaan o tademaw katokoh i tosa a bataan a mang kakatood, Kalingko a kowan o saanaway tabakiay kasaopon a picakayan to tood Carrefoor , HOLA, patizeng sato tini a kenis. liwliw a hekal Masikasik a kenis hamin a hekal o masaenalay ko liwliw, liwliw no enal hamin no kenis pakala to 97%, notimolan saamisan tanaya', nowalian satipan likeco, notimolan saamisan o tanaya' sabaw enem km, nowalian satipan o saahebalay lima km, izaw ko Cikep a saowac, Sancan a saowac, ato Simeci a saowac a kalikid. nilacolan caay kaw nikalokan ato nibotingan dada', malahad koni pasazoma to ba'to a sakakawawan. Masikasik a kenis o sakowanan polong makakilac to waloay a kasiniyazo', Masikasik a niyazo', Somolado a niyazo', Palamitan a niyazo', Tahan a niyazo', Hopo a niyazo', katanka a niyazo', Kaliyawan a ziyazo', Cyasin a niyazo'. 1/8. hamin a kenis polong a kalasic o Masikasik ato Hopo tosa ko angangan a niyazo', oyni tosaay tabakiay a niyazo' o Masikasik a kenis malasit aca to nowamisan a Masikasik ato notimolan o Masikasik, tosaay a kakitizaan lilis o Sancan a saowac, masasolaed to sabaw tosa kong-li. saamisan o Masikasik paso Masikasik ato Somolado tosa a niyazo', malabelaw to Taloko kanatal a aidangan ato Sohowa a zazan, Siwlin koo-cong, Masikasik aididi'ay a cacodadan, Masikasik pikacawan to baso, Masikasik a zinziya, Masikasik a aidangan ato Masikasik mokasiay a zazanan aooyni kenis a kakitizaan ngangan to nipatizeng tini i nowamisan Masikasik, nika oynian a kakitizaan izaw ko tosa malebot lima lasobo ko tademaw, hamin no a kenis pakala to 1/8. . notimolan Masikasik paso Hopo, Kaliyawan, Tahan, Palamitan, Cyasin ato Katanka enem kasaniyazo', hamin no kenis katooday a tademaw, miliyas to sakowan, sakowan to Kalingko tose pakala tolo a kong-li ka batad, Hopo a pikacawan, Masikasik a kenis yakoba ato hokosiw, malokay pisopedan to kalisiw, paiyobinan, hitay a padekoan, ngayangay, Kalingko a pahikokian, Katanka kakitizaan no hikoki, Tahan talakaway a picodadan, Haysin kawcong, Masikasik a kocong,Taywan dingkiay a kosi, ato Carrefoor o kahenolan a kakatayzaan patizeng i notimola no Masikasik. demiad . demiad tongos tatongosay a caledes, hamin no kenis mihcaan palalecad to akoti' se-s 22.5 To, palalecad to nikaodadan 2,264 mm, sa'pi' ko demiad sepat poo' mahiza o sadingsing. laylay Masikasik a kenis i ayaway a dowman " hakay " Tawkeman." han. pikowann no holam a ziday Cya-cin a mihcaan, Tan-soy a sakowan tademaw ci U-cyen liliden ko papalokayay tayni tini patadas, Taloko a tademaw kinapina misamamaw militangah, misanga' to sapitena', pangangan han "Masikasik," sato zayhan midebong ko yincomin sisa ales han ko tose mabolaw tatimol. 1875 a mihcaan Bo-cyen hekalay a zazan sakakaay mikowanay ci Ti-to-low-ta-con mikelid to hitay mipatades to So-how katokoh i Kalingko a zazan, o saayaway micododay toynian Kalingko, pangangan han to "Masikasik". Masikasik i celacan 1896 a mihcaan zayhan i pingangayaw madebec maala to no Lipon. 1914 a mihcaan, pikowanan no Linpon a ziday o Taywan sakakaay no mikowanan ci Cow-cyo-cyen cow-ma no ozip a poton mikelid to hitay no Linpon midademec to Taloko, . masazay to kina kawaw hawsa tini patizeng to Kalingko a sakowa Masikasi paca' a sakakaay, sakakaay a tapang a mabolah ci Cow-cow-cyenaan sakakaay a tapang to nikawawan, kilol i 1920 a mihcaan no zomaay a ngangan "Yen-hay" han, o Masikasik paca' a sakowan pasomadan to ngangan "Yen-hay paca' a sakowan" han," pikowan to Pin-ya a kakitizaan. 1937 a mihcaan Kalingko a sakowan a kakitizaan misomad to lice, alesan ko Yen-hay paca' a sakowan, Pin-ya a kakitizaan somad to ngangan "Yen-hay a niyazo'" han, tongos no Kalingkoay a sakowan Kalingko a kakowanan. zikozan no ngangayaw dodoc pazomaay to ngangan, sakowan nao Kalikoan a kenis binacadan a kakitizaan, patizeng to Kalinngko a kowan Yen-hay a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan mananokas to malomanay a ngangan "Masikasik", pasomad han ko ngangan Masikasik a kenis, sato o yincomin a no boyo' a kakitizaan kakilokilol sato tahekal, patizeng haca to zomay Siw-lin a kenis katokoh ayza. tademaw Masikasik a kenis no Kalingko akowan sakasepat no katod no tademaw, ozeket o sakatolo a katalakaw to pikawawan a kakitizaan, zoma a tademaw kazeket palalecad talakawanko hamin no kanatal. ayzaay to sabalima a mihcaan, Masikasik a kenis o tademaw mahiza to i 2.0~2.1 a mgangn ko tademaw i labo, 2019 a mihcaan lima a boladan o tademaw ato 2011 a mihcaan malecad to, caay kasomcd, no Taywan tose micidekay koniklahad. . nika oynian to a mihcaan kilol to Kalingko akowan cenbo i Hopo a niyazo' patizeng katokoh 651 loma'an to pito a tatonngdoh no masakapahay a loma', i sasaay a lomam' o sapisiwbay, pakay sebo akowan palecad mikawaw mitakos to misiwbayay a kawaw, oyniay a kakitizaan micapi to Kalingko a tose, labo no kanatal izaw ko tabakiay a kakitizaan pacakay, talaayaw tiniay a kakitizaan adasay mala o Kalingko kalamkamay maladah a kakitizaan. cacolilan sakayhikokiay silamalay a zazan tele zazan, balohay "Taloko" pikacawan, Hopo pikacawan Kalingko micapi minato a zazan, Hopo pikacawan pakatine to zazan. sakaylalangawan niyazo' a kamo no Taloko ko kamo ato A-mis a kamo. o tademaw na i Cong-yen mabolaway o ngayngay ko katooday, caay kakatood ko yincomin, Taywan malepon na mangangayaw hawsa, katood ko Holam mabolaw tayni tini, mahiza kasomamadan malomanay Layak a lisin, ienalay a yincomin paymihcaan to waloay a bolad malingato to mamalikid.
